text: Embassy is a 1972 British spy thriller movie directed by Gordon Hessler and was based on the 1969 novel of the same name by Stephen Coulter. It stars Richard Roundtree, Chuck Connors, Max von Sydow, Broderick Crawford, Ray Milland, Marie-Jos√© Nat, David Bauer, Karl Held and Larry Cross. ==Other websites== * Category:1972 action movies Category:1970s spy movies Category:British action thriller movies Category:British drama thriller movies Category:British spy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Gordon Hessler Category:1970s English-language movies Category:British crime thriller movies Category:Cold War movies Category:1972 crime drama movies Category:British crime drama movies Category:1970s independent movies Category:1972 crime thriller movies Category:1970s British drama movies
